NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: FOR ALL KEYWORDS: If your language has cases, the keyword NAMES must be lower case, or they won't match!

DESCRIPTION: Upon entering this #yStance, lose [W] [W] . You can't change #yStances. Exit this #yStance at the start of your next turn.
You gain #yMantra at the start of your turn.
NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is a keyword for the Devotion power from the base game.
This is a keyword for the Slimed curse from the base game.

DESCRIPTION: Карты, которые имеют ослабленный эффект зельев, они #yОставляются и #yСжигаются.
